column4: ca someone help me, i have a sound problem, audio applications such as Amarok play sound fine but applications such as ZSNES refuse to, i think its from a new update
hi, i have a problem with my nvida sound no audio capture works and some applications dont output sound
Capture as in record? - and what programs lack sound

If your sound is onboard sometimes it will only allow sound to be in one program at once, like if you play an mp3 - you will have to close the MP3 program, then restart your browser to have sound in it --- its tedious I know..
